title: 08/06/2021 - HOUR 1 - LeBron, Prescott
itunes:title: 08/06/2021 - HOUR 1 - LeBron, Prescott
description:
Nick Wright filling in for Colin


Charles Barkley is absolutely wrong about LeBron James

Update on the health of Dak Prescott

Do the Packers and Aaron Rodgers have a handshake deal?


Guest: Eric Mangini
